select inviter.USERNAME,inviter.REMARK,inviter.ADDTIME,inviterlog.STATUS,inviter.RED_TYPE as redType,inviter.RED_MONEY as redMoney from t_red_envelop_inviter inviter left join t_red_envelop_inviter_log inviterlog on inviterlog.ID = inviter.OPTID and inviterlog.`ACTIVE`=1 where 1= 1 and inviter.`ACTIVE`=1
order by inviter.ADDTIME DESC
select count(*) from t_red_envelop_inviter inviter left join t_red_envelop_inviter_log inviterlog on inviterlog.ID = inviter.OPTID and inviterlog.`ACTIVE`=1 where 1= 1 and inviter.`ACTIVE`=1
select inviter.ID, inviter.USERID as userId,inviter.RED_TYPE as redType,inviter.RED_MONEY as redMoney,inviter.REMARK as remark from t_red_envelop_inviter inviter where inviter.OPTID = #{_parameter}
